message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Among the side effects listed for buspirone, lightheadedness is the most common. Dry mouth is also a relatively common side effect. Respiratory depression and sleepwalking are not commonly associated with buspirone.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Buspirone is an anxiolytic medication mainly used for generalized anxiety disorder. The most common side effect is lightheadedness, while dry mouth is also a common side effect. Respiratory depression and sleepwalking are not commonly associated with buspirone use.

Dry mouth is also a common side effect. Respiratory depression and sleepwalking are not common side effects of buspirone.
